summary: Harvey Lowmyer is identified as an alias of Eric Starvo Galt and John Willard, who is a suspect in the assassination of Martin Luther King, Jr. The documents consist of CIA cables disseminating information about Galt/Lowmyer/Willard to various locations worldwide, seeking assistance in locating him. The cables provide physical descriptions and other identifying information to aid in the search.
significance: Harvey Lowmyer, as an alias of Eric Starvo Galt, is significant in the context of the Martin Luther King, Jr. assassination investigation. The documents suggest that authorities were actively seeking Galt/Lowmyer/Willard as a suspect in the assassination.
